attributes.action: Change law so parents have supreme rights when deciding on Medical/ life support
attributes.background: Change the law to enable parents to have supreme rights over courts about decisions about sick children.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly what you mean by "parents to have supreme rights over courts about decisions about sick children". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
